source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video begins with a wide, first-person perspective shot looking out from a sunlit room. A desk with futuristic gadgets occupies the foreground across the bottom of the frame. In the middle ground, a large, curved sculpture is on the left, and two gramophone horns are positioned in the center-right. A small, circular aircraft flies from the upper center of the room into the background, exiting through a large window that displays a cityscape. The camera then pans unsteadily to the right, settling on a holographic desktop screen that fills the center-right foreground. On this screen, an incoming call notification is displayed, with text at the top center and a skull icon in the middle, all overlaid on a video feed showing a person hanging upside down on the left against a cityscape background. The loft interior and the window view remain visible in the background to the left of the screen. The camera is positioned at eye-level.
